modShortDescription: This 7DTD mod changes the temperature to be colder the higher up you go. This is a standalone mod that only modifies the weathersurvival.xml file.
modDescription:
This 7DTD mod changes the temperature to be colder the higher up you go. This is a standalone mod that only modifies the weathersurvival.xml file. It should work well with the other **Punishing weather** themed mods.

**Warning:** This mod may not play well with other weathersurvival.xml modifying mods because it adds a table of **same named** node properties of temperatures.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/doughphunghus/7D2D-Doughs-Mods-a18/tree/main/Doughs-PunishingWeather-Survival)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17197-doughs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Doughphunghus](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/doughphunghus/)
